attributes.additional_details:
Tre left his family and friends and moved to Manchester to dedicate his life to this sport. Today Tre received an email informing him he had not been selected and would not be going to the world championships in Columbia, this means he cannot participate at Rio 2016. 

Please help me by signing this petition and get British cycling to over ride the decision and take my son to the Olympics. 

Micheal Pusey, MBE  Tre's trainer from age 9.
attributes.background: My son Tre Whyte has rode BMX for the past 4 years. In 2014 the BMX world championships was held in Holland, Tre was not selected but took it upon himself to go and he won a bronze medal for great Britain gaining points for Rio 2016.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the decision for British Cycling and not the UK Government and Parliament.
